title: How to Make Apricot Fritters

steps.headline: Soak the apricots in sugar and the rum (or other alcohol).
Drain the apricots completely.
steps.description: Allow them to sit in a colander over a sink to drip clear.

steps.headline: Dip the soaked apricots into the fritter batter.
Deep fry the battered apricots in hot oil.
Remove the golden fritters from the oil.
steps.description: Place on a large plate covered with kitchen paper towel to drain excess oil off.

steps.headline: Dust with icing sugar or caster (superfine) sugar to lift the sweetness.

text: Soak the apricots in sugar and the rum (or other alcohol). Allow to soak for 30 minutes. Drain the apricots completely. Allow them to sit in a colander over a sink to drip clear. Dip the soaked apricots into the fritter batter.  Deep fry the battered apricots in hot oil.  Remove the golden fritters from the oil. Place on a large plate covered with kitchen paper towel to drain excess oil off. Dust with icing sugar or caster (superfine) sugar to lift the sweetness.  Serve warm.  Finished.
